name: Crisp Waffles
steps: Preheat waffle iron while making batter.
Whip 2 eggs until frothy. Add milk and butter.
Combine all dry ingredients in a separate bowl, dry whisk to combine. Add to wet ingredients and mix just until combined, do not overmix, will be slightly lumpy.
Put approx. 1/4 c. batter on hot greased waffle iron. Cook according to waffle iron directions.
